title: Out of the total area notified as "Integrated IT Township" (1) 50% FSI shall be used for IT / ITES activities and (1) 50% FSI for the development of residential and commercial activities provided that 20% area shall be kept for Park / Play Ground / Garden of total IITP
clause_text: Out of the total area notified as "Integrated IT Township" (1) 50% FSI shall be used for IT / ITES activities and (1) 50% FSI for the development of residential and commercial activities provided that 20% area shall be kept for Park / Play Ground / Garden of total IITP.
section: General Norms for Different Land Use

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
